item.title: in Easton
item.description: Restaurants: Sunflowers and Greens: http://sunflowersandgreens.com/ fresh and delicious lunch: salads and sandwiches Scossa http://scossarestaurant.com/ upscale Italian dinner Activities: Pickering Creek Audubon Center https://pickering.audubon.org/ over 200 species of birds have been spotted here! A beautiful spot for a stroll, any time of day Art galleries keep an eye out for work by Mo Herbert, our talented family artist!

item.title: in St. Michael's
item.description: Restaurants The Crab Claw https://www.thecrabclaw.com/ a family favorite the best spot to try your hand at cracking open local crabs, and enjoy cold beers while you watch the boats come in and out of the marina Avaâ€™s Pizzeria and Wine Bar https://www.avaspizzeria.com/ great pizza and pasta! Laid back and casual, quick stop The Galley https://www.

item.title: nearest airports and train stations
item.description: BWI (Baltimore) about an hour and fifteen minutes from Easton. between BWI and the Eastern Shore, you must cross the Chesapeake Bay Bridge (which is under construction and known for its traffic!) there is a shuttle between BWI and the Easton Airport (this is a very small airport, and does not offer commercial flights). ILG (Wilmington) avoids the Bay Bridge, but may be a bit more expensive Bayrunner Shuttle
